cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 30 miles south of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: continuing northeast along the U.S. Mid-Atlantic coast and then toward Atlantic Canada
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just offshore of Cape Fear / Cape Lookout, North Carolina

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch/Warning confined to South Santee River SC northward to the NC/VA border; no Florida coastline under watch
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from South Santee River SC to the NC/VA border; Storm-Surge Warning Cape Fear NC to Poquoson VA; no Florida coastline
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Atlantic coastline from Florida through the Carolinas northward to New England and Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.wind: Only occasional gusty squalls from outer bands possible; sustained tropical-storm-force winds unlikely (<5% probability)
weather_observation.storm_surge: No significant surge expected; water levels remain near normal astronomical tides at Port Everglades
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall expected; only isolated showers from distant outer rainbands
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents and high surf along the southeast Florida beaches will persist for another 24-36 h, posing a risk to small-craft operations
